results.name: Potion Making with Morphi! (Currently a rough Demo)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete Non Mobile GPU with 1 GB Ram
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 3 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete Non Mobile GPU with 2 GB Ram
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
